posts.post_content:
I have two HOF's for sale as follows:

Zack Wheat - PSA 2, centered well, Piedmont 350-460, Fac. 25 It does having staining on back, but no paper loss. SOLD .
Johnny Evers (Chicago on Shirt) - PSA 3, centered well, SC 350 back, Fac. 30. Price is $190.00 OBO delivered.

All prices are delivered for PayPal F/F payment. Scans available, just send me your e-mail address.

Thanks,

Bill
